name: Tamagooshi TwitchPlays
description:
This tamagooshi is intended to be used in twitch streams and it is NOT playable standalone. It needs to connect with a twitch channel chat e receive its commands to work properly.

This project was created to be used as a study case in my article "Fazendo Twitch Plays com Unity" that you can find it here. You can also check its code in my github account.

A game by Nonyko.

.
